name: DASH
description:
DASH is primarily a First Person Platforming game that focuses on a "dash" mechanic that gives the player an additional boost in speed. This "dash" can be used to platform across levels, avoid hazardous obstacles, and dash through enemies to destroy them.

NOTE: If you do enjoy the game please vote for it on STEAM GREENLIGHT here:https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails...

  • First Person "Dash" action, where you can dash to platform, avoid obstacles, and destroy enemies.
  • 5 Levels featuring different challenges such as moving platforms, spiked walls, and turret-enemies!
  • Time trial: The game will track how long you take to complete each level, you can replay levels to try to beat your last best time!
  • A space-y, trippy artstyle.
  • A short story involving the mysterious PYR4M1D.
  • An original electronic soundtrack by Paul Kim.
  • How long is the game? - The game will take roughly 40min - 1hr to beat depending on your experience with first person platforming games. You can also replay levels to shorten your times for additional fun.
  • Future Plans and Updates? - Though I do not intend to release additional levels after release, I will keep track of bugs. Please report any bugs *here*
  • Follow me on twitter here: https://twitter.com/JFrisoGames
  • Follow the game on indieDB here: http://www.indiedb.com/games/dash
  • Contact me on LinkedIn: https://ca.linkedin.com/in/jay-friso-39b963119
  • Email me for any technical support: jfrisogames@gmail.com
